ygData.subject: Re: SORRY!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehehe Sylly..we DO get pets hon..at level 32 :) can you say MANA SONG? Amazes me still how many wizzies n clerics and mana using types wimper for a bard
ygData.messageBody:
>I second - send more bard stories!
>
>Sylly Songsynger
>Bard of the 22st song
>Selling Swords and Such
>somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>p.s. Roken - this is what I do - punch a decay skelly and then let him
>follow me around and I pretend like I got a pet :-) (waiting for the lev
>when we do get real pets - ok ok not real pets but short term charms).
>Eventually, someone helpful kills him off and I axe - why did u kill my
>pet??? <hehe>
>

Hehehe Sylly..we DO get pets hon..at level 32 :) can you say MANA SONG?
Amazes me still how many wizzies n clerics and mana using types wimper for a
bard when we are in the same zone. I have had them ask if they can just
group with me til their mana is back..LOL it is so FUN! Just ask Darrien
about how seductive the song can be..MUAHAHAH :)

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 36th chorus (at last!)
Happily charming the will out of mana users
Somewhere on Innoruuk
